thread.title: BRIEF-Ovid Therapeutics Announces OV101 Granted Fast Track Designation By FDA For Fragile X Syndrome Treatment

title: BRIEF-Ovid Therapeutics Announces OV101 Granted Fast Track Designation By FDA For Fragile X Syndrome Treatment

organizations.name: fda for fragile x syndrome treatment reuters

text: 25 PM / Updated 20 minutes ago BRIEF-Ovid Therapeutics Announces OV101 Granted Fast Track Designation By FDA For Fragile X Syndrome Treatment Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   Ovid Therapeutics Inc: * OVID THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCES OV101 GRANTED FAST TRACK DESIGNATION BY U.S. FDA FOR TREATMENT OF FRAGILE X SYNDROME * OVID THERAPEUTICS INC - ‍INTENDS TO INITIATE A PHASE 2 CLINICAL TRIAL IN 2018​ * OVID - ‍TOPLINE DATA FROM PHASE 2 STARS CLINICAL TRIAL INVESTIGATING OV101 EXPECTED IN SECOND HALF OF 2018​ Source text for Eikon:
